Object.Field: Used to determine whether or not a particular package should be run in full or incremental mode.

Number of days prior to the last ETL run to include in the ETL extract window. Used in calculating LAST_EXTRACT_DATE which identifies those records to be extracted in an incremental ETL run. Essentially extends the window of time for records to be evaluated for extraction beyond just those that have changed or were created since the last ETL run.
This is a global variable set in Configuration Manager. Being a global variable, it impacts all ETL runs.

<$ if ("#BIAPPS.EXECUTION_ID".equals("-1")) /* Run only when it is not called from Load Plans */ { $> OdiStartScen "-SCEN_NAME=EXEC_TABLE_MAINT_PROC" "-SCEN_VERSION=001" "-SESSION_NAME=EXEC_TABLE_MAINT_PROC-CLN-WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_TGT" "-BIAPPS.DDL_TABLE_LIST=WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_TGT:895602" "-BIAPPS.DDL_RUN_MODE=CLEAN" <$ } $>

<$ if ("#BIAPPS.EXECUTION_ID".equals("-1")) /* Run only when it is not called from Load Plans */ { $> OdiStartScen "-SCEN_NAME=EXEC_TABLE_MAINT_PROC" "-SCEN_VERSION=001" "-SESSION_NAME=EXEC_TABLE_MAINT_PROC-BEF-WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_TGT" "-BIAPPS.DDL_TABLE_LIST=WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_TGT:895602" "-BIAPPS.DDL_RUN_MODE=BEFORE" <$ } $>

insert <$ if (bulkClause.equals("Y")) { $> /*+ append */ <$}$> into <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_TGT", "DW_BIAPPS11G", "", "D") ?> ( ID, TECHNOLOGY
)
select <$=loadhintstr$> <?if("NUMBER".contains("CHAR")){?>SUBSTR(ID,0,0)<?} else {?>ID<?}?>, <?if("VARCHAR2".contains("CHAR")){?>SUBSTR(TECHNOLOGY,0,100)<?} else {?>TECHNOLOGY<?}?>
FROM (
select <$=exthintstr$>
WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_SRC.ID ID, WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_SRC.TECHNOLOGY TECHNOLOGY from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_SRC", "DW_BIAPPS11G", "", "D")?> WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_SRC where (1=1)
) ODI_GET_FROM

/* Insert/Update reference dates into History Table */
insert into <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "W_ETL_LOAD_DATES_LOG", "D") ?> (DATASOURCE_NUM_ID, PACKAGE_NAME, TARGET_TABLE_NAME, ETL_USAGE_CODE, ETL_PROC_WID, LOAD_PLAN_ID, SESSION_ID, WIP_LOAD_START_DATE, LAST_MAX_DATE, ETL_LOAD_DATE, COMMITTED ) select DATASOURCE_NUM_ID, PACKAGE_NAME, TARGET_TABLE_NAME, ETL_USAGE_CODE, ETL_PROC_WID, LOAD_PLAN_ID, <?=snpRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?>, WIP_LOAD_START_DATE, LAST_MAX_DATE, ETL_LOAD_DATE, COMMITTED FROM <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "W_ETL_LOAD_DATES", "D") ?> where DATASOURCE_NUM_ID = :BIAPPS.DATASOURCE_NUM_ID and PACKAGE_NAME = '<? if(odiRef.getSession("SCEN_NAME").equals("")){ out.print("KNOWLEDGE_MODULE_TEST"); } else { out.print(odiRef.getSession("SCEN_NAME")); } ?>' and ETL_USAGE_CODE = :BIAPPS.ETL_USAGE_CODE
Insert reference dates to History Table

<$ if ("#BIAPPS.EXECUTION_ID".equals("-1")) /* Run only when it is not called from Load Plans */ { $> OdiStartScen "-SCEN_NAME=EXEC_TABLE_MAINT_PROC" "-SCEN_VERSION=001" "-SESSION_NAME=EXEC_TABLE_MAINT_PROC-AFT-WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_TGT" "-BIAPPS.DDL_TABLE_LIST=WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_TGT:895602" "-BIAPPS.DDL_RUN_MODE=AFTER" <$ } $>

<$ if ("#BIAPPS.EXECUTION_ID".equals("-1")) /* Run only when it is not called from Load Plans */ { $> OdiStartScen "-SCEN_NAME=EXEC_TABLE_MAINT_PROC" "-SCEN_VERSION=001" "-SESSION_NAME=EXEC_TABLE_MAINT_PROC-CLN-WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_TGT" "-BIAPPS.DDL_TABLE_LIST=WC_FLEX_DEPLOY_TGT:895602" "-BIAPPS.DDL_RUN_MODE=CLEAN" <$ } $>
